alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:49AM PST until January 17 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Icing continues. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Greater Portland Metro Area
